lead_paragraph: A gold medal in the 50-meter butterfly at the world swimming championships in Shanghai, a medal of recognition for Yao Ming upon his retirement from basketball and the end of the N.F.L. lockout.
snippet: A gold medal in the 50-meter butterfly at the world swimming championships in Shanghai, a medal of recognition for Yao Ming upon his retirement from basketball and the end of the N.F.L. lockout.
